Class TablePanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • TablePanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, PokerConstant

     class TablePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements PokerConstant
    This class extends JPanel and contains all the game drawings and images of a Poker Game.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Rabi Thapa
